author: ZeroDown
title: one of my all time favorites
review:
i remember getting this for my 12th bday and how thrilled i was. i wound up rebuilding it prolly 30-40 times over the next few years. it doesn't seem very popular around here, but i have no idea why; there's just something about it that's irresistible to me. it's not the most complex set ever, nor does it have a lot of moving parts. i'll even go as fas as to say it's not even that aesthetically pleasing... but when it's all put together, i just adore it.  

i'd say it's well worth $100 if that's what you have to pay to get it off eBay or another site. i certainly wouldn't part with mine for a cent less. in fact, it'd prolly have to be a lot me. 

all told, just a fantastic set. an all time classic in my mind.
